marklogic.body: If I am assaulted.... *I* get to make the decision... on the Spot... in the shock of the moment.... as to whether I am in fear for my life. Zimmerman's short, fat self was put in a bad position (regardless of injury) by a violent person... it isn't for Zimmerman to "wait and see if this guy kills or disables me".
